descriptor.name: Raaga Professional Pro Botanix Anti Frizz Shampoo With Shea Butter, Rosemary, 1000 ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Raaga Professional ProBotanix Anti Frizz shampoo with Shea Butter, Smoothes and Controls Unruly Frizzy Hair, For Men and Women, 1000 ml 
 
 Anti-frizz shampoo is infused with the goodness of shea butter having Vitamin A and Vitamin E that provides gentle conditioning
 Feel the smooth hair free from stress, dryness & brittleness, and calm frizz worries. Leaves hair feeling soft, smooth and shiny.
 This product is rich in antioxidants and gives shiny, strong and nourished hair. Effective against dry frizzy hair
 Ingredients present in this shampoo help nourish and hydrate your hair. It repairs split ends, dull brittle hair and lubricates frizzy hair
 Usage: Take sufficient amount of shampoo and work up a lather on wet hair. Rinse and repeat if required. Apply Anti Frizz Conditioner on wet hair and rinse

descriptor.name: Biker's 2-in-1 Shampoo + Conditioner, Enriched with Whey Proteins and Almonds, Helps to Make Hair Strong, Bouncy, Smooth and Shiny - Shampoo for Men (340 ml)
descriptor.short_desc:
When on the road, you will be exposed to dust and dirt. But with the all-new Biker’s Strong & Bouncy Shampoo, you can enjoy the journey without worrying about your hair. Enriched with Whey Protein and Almonds, this scientifically crafted men’s shampoo strengthens and smoothens your hair. So that you can claim the road ahead. With the goodness of Whey protein and Almonds, this scientifically crafted strong & bouncy shampoo will give you strong and smooth hair as you drive through the day on wheels. Biker's strong and bouncy shampoo is just what you need.
 Whey Protein: As hair itself is made of protein, whey protein helps boost hair growth 
 Almond: It is the best source of magnesium and other vital nutrients that nourishes hair follicles 
 It nourishes and strengthens the hair from its roots 
 It prevents dandruff and hair damage and promotes hair growth 
 2 in 1 Shampoo + Conditioner gives strong, smooth, shiny and bouncy hair with Long Lasting Conditioning 
 Hair Strengthening Shampoo for Men 
 Biker's Strong and Bouncy Hair Shampoo is available in 2 Sizes: 180 ml and 340 ml 
 Try out our exciting Men's Grooming Range of Face Washes in Detox, Detan & Anti-Acne variants along with Shampoo, Body Washes and Beard Care Range. Join the Biker's Gang - Stop at Nothing! 
 Country of Origin: India

descriptor.name: Meera Enrich 1 Step Express Hair Spa (Shampoo + Mask) Enriched With Kashmir's Saffron For Strong And Frizz Free Hair, 200ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Flaunt your hair with Meera 1 step express hair spa, enriched with the natural goodness of Kashmir's Saffron and helps in reducing frizz, thereby providing strong and conditioned hairs. Meera hair spa provides you with 2 in 1 benefits of shampoo and mask, hence providing deep conditioning. Traditionally known to promote healthy hair growth, precious saffron is extracted from the locale of Kashmir. Saffron's antioxidant properties prevent hair loss, purifies the scalp and repairs damaged hair. The hair spa has no parabens, no silicones, no sulphates and is suitable for all hair types and is gentle enough for everyday use. It is ideal for men & women.
 Meera Enrich 1 Step Express Spa enriched with goodness of Kashmir's Saffron
 For Strong and Anti-Frizz hair
 No Sulphate, No Silicone, No Paraben
 A 2 in 1 Shampoo + Hair mask product
 Goodness of Tradition
 Ingredients-Saffron

descriptor.name: Indica Easy Do-It-Yourself Hair Color Shampoo Pump Pack with 5 Herbal Extracts and 100% Ammonia Free, Long Lasting Formula, 180 ML - Natural Black Colour (Gloves Included)
descriptor.short_desc:
Now hair colouring is super easy with Indica!
 Indica Easy Shampoo Based Hair colour is a revolutionary product from the house of CavinKare. It enhances and maintains the bright shade of your hair keeping them fresh and glossy. Our hair colour offers maximum grey hair coverage and yields the best results. Hair is protected from chemicals such as Ammonia, which is not a part of our product formula. It is a quick and convenient 10 minutes shampoo-based Hair colouring product. This can be directly applied by hand with the help of gloves. It is one of the most convenient forms of applying colour where you don't need to seek anyone's help for colouring. So why wait? Colour your hair by yourself! Do it as easily as using shampoo.
 Indica Hair Colours are suitable for all hair types. We are introducing the Indica Easy Shampoo Color + Care Kit Pack which is a 3-in-1 Kit Pack consisting of Hair Colour, Conditioner and Hair Serum. Indica Easy Sachets are available in 3 Shades: Natural Black, Dark Brown and Burgundy. Also, the Indica Creme hair colour is also available in 3 Shades: Natural Black, Natural Brown and Burgundy.
 An enriching hair coloring experience with Amla, Henna, Bhringraj, Hibiscus and Fenugreek.
 Benefits of Ingredients gives super food to hair, conditions and strengths hair roots, masks grey hair and maintains hair health.
 Super Easy Multi Use Shampoo Based Hair Color Pump Pack with 2 Pairs of Reusable Gloves
 Easy to apply using gloved hands with just 10 minutes action time.
 The No Ammonia formula of the shampoo hair color results in long lasting rich colour for Men and Women.
 Turning grey hair to black is now super easy Country of Origin - India

Now hair colouring is super easy with Indica!

descriptor.name: Nyle Anti Dandruff 2 In 1 Shampoo + Conditioner For Strong & Nourished Hair, With Tea Tree & Mint , 800ml
descriptor.short_desc:
Nyle 2 in 1 Shampoo+Conditioner is packed with the goodness of Tea Tree and Mint, is a superior formula that combines the benefits of Shampoo and Conditioner. It is an anti hairfall & anti dandruff formula that helps in improvement in scalp health over regular use. The product benefits are helpful in reduction of scalp itchiness & dryness giving you stronger and nourished hair.
 
 GOODBYE DANDRUFF WOES, HELLO CONDITIONING: 2 in 1 shampoo is infused with Mint which has anti bacterial properties which helps prevent flakiness & Tea Tree which helps in reducing dandruff. The shampoo combines dual action of shampoo and conditioner and is a super formula that helps you enjoy dandruff free gentle and soft hair all day long.
 ENRICHED WITH VITAMIN E : Vitamin E regulates oil imbalance, reduces dandruff and manages overall scalp health.
 REDUCES DRYNESS & FLAKING : Shampoo infused with Tea Tree, Mint & Vitamin E helps in reduction of visible flaking & dryness of scalp.
 NO PARABENS, NO DYE , NO PHTHALATE:Say no to harmful nasties! This shampoo is free from paraben ,phthalate, dyes & is colorant free. It is crafted with ingredients straight out of Nature's lab which makes it suitable for everyday use.
 SUITABLE FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: This shampoo is suitable for all hair types & safe for chemically treated hair.
descriptor.long_desc:
Nyle 2 in 1 Shampoo+Conditioner is packed with the goodness of Tea Tree and Mint, is a superior formula that combines the benefits of Shampoo and Conditioner. It is an anti hairfall & anti dandruff formula that helps in improvement in scalp health over regular use. The product benefits are helpful in reduction of scalp itchiness & dryness giving you stronger and nourished hair.
 
 GOODBYE DANDRUFF WOES, HELLO CONDITIONING: 2 in 1 shampoo is infused with Mint which has anti bacterial properties which helps prevent flakiness & Tea Tree which helps in reducing dandruff. The shampoo combines dual action of shampoo and conditioner and is a super formula that helps you enjoy dandruff free gentle and soft hair all day long.

 REDUCES DRYNESS & FLAKING : Shampoo infused with Tea Tree, Mint & Vitamin E helps in reduction of visible flaking & dryness of scalp.

 SUITABLE FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: This shampoo is suitable for all hair types & safe for chemically treated hair.

descriptor.short_desc:
Every drop of Nyle Naturals Anti hairfall shampoo is Paraben free & contains goodness of natural extracts of Almonds, Green gram sprouts and a blend of natural herbs. Almonds help make the hair strong, shiny, soft to touch and shiny. It strengthens your hair and protects from hairfall due to breakage. Sprouts contain vitamin C, which is considered to promote hair growth. It helps you enjoy strong & healthy hair#. #Strengthens hair by reducing hair breakage. Based on lab results under test conditions.
 REDUCES HAIR FALL :- Reinforces hair strength & prevents hair fall due to breakage. Provides advanced nourishment and protection.
 INGREDIENTS :-With the goodness of natural extracts of Apple Cider Vinegar And Argan Oil, helping you enjoy Soft and Shiny hair.
 SAFE FOR CHEMICALLY TREATED HAIR :- Made from all natural ingredients, the Shampoo does not do any harm & is suitable for all hair types. It is safe for colored or chemically treated hair.
 USAGE :- Gentle enough for everyday use. Suitable For All Hair Types
 Nyle is a gentle and Natural shampoo curated with the goodness of natural ingredients like apple cider vinegar and argan oil. It cleanses the scalp gently keeping your hair soft and shiny all day long.
 Apple Cider Vinegar And Argan Oil
